cases.title: EUR Card underpayment — 3.8% contract vs 3.53% actual
cases.summary: EUR Card incoming payments show systematic underpayment from February through July 2025. Contract rate is 3.8% but reconciliation shows effective rates of 3.50-3.64%. Total underpayment: 133,419.09 EUR across 6 months.

cases.title: GBP Card underpayment — 4.8% contract vs 3.58% actual
cases.summary: GBP Card incoming payments show systematic underpayment from February through July 2025. Contract rate is 4.8% but reconciliation shows effective rates of 3.50-3.97%. Total underpayment: 8,231.22 EUR across 6 months. The rate dropped sharply from 4.8% in January to ~3.5% from March onwards.

cases.title: Multi-currency overpayment — 3.5% contract vs 3.75% actual
cases.summary: Multi-currency overpayment across EUR, AUD, GBP, and NOK Card streams in July-August 2025. Contract rate is 3.5% but reconciliation shows effective rates of 3.69-3.80%. Total overpayment: 74,839.85 EUR. The bulk of the overpayment is in AUD Card (56,468 EUR) and EUR Card (18,140 EUR).

cases.title: Multi-currency underpayment — 3.8% contract vs 3.50% actual
cases.summary: Multi-currency underpayment across EUR, AUD, USD, and NOK Card streams from February through May 2025. Contract rate is 3.8% but reconciliation shows effective rates of 3.50-3.60%. Total underpayment: 74,226.71 EUR. EUR Card accounts for the majority (64,140.91 EUR).
